<p> PlaneSensor converts pointing device motion into 2D translation parallel to the local Z=0 plane. </p> <p> X3D Tooltips of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#PlaneSensor" target="_blank">PlaneSensor</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/Architecture.html" target="_blank">X3D Specification</a> sections of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/pointingsensor.html" target="_blank">20 Pointing device sensor component</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/pointingsensor.html#Concepts" target="_blank">20.2 Concepts</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/pointingsensor.html#PlaneSensor" target="_blank">20.4.2 PlaneSensor</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dResources.html#Examples" target="_blank">X3D Examples Archives</a> of related interest: </p> <ul> <li> VRML 2 Sourcebook:&nbsp; <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/Vrml2Sourcebook/Chapter09SensingViewer" target="_blank">Chapter 09 Sensing Viewer</a> </li> <li> X3D for Web Authors: <a href="http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter08UserInteractivity" target="_blank">Chapter 08 User Interactivity</a> </li> </ul>
